Description:
[Smoke]NPE throws out and block the next operation when creating a datasource

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070612-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a report
2, New a datasource and select a type of datasource
3, Click next

Expected result:
The datasource can be created successfully

Actual result:
NPE throws out and block the datasource creation

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.datatools.help.HelpUtil.getHelpString(HelpUtil.java:196)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.help.HelpUtil.getContextId(HelpUtil.java:149)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.ui.wizards.NewConnectionProfileWizardPage.createControl(NewConnectionProfileWizardPage.java:247)

This is a DTP bug in the context sensitive help utility, see bug 192021.  It is fixed today, and will appear in DTP 1.5RC3 6/12 build.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 192021 ***
